movies.title: Toy Story
movies.plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

movies.title: Jumanji
movies.plot: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

movies.title: Grumpier Old Men
movies.plot: John and Max resolve to save their beloved bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant, just as its new female owner catches Max's attention.

movies.title: Waiting to Exhale
movies.plot: Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with men.

movies.title: Father of the Bride Part II
movies.plot: In this sequel, George Banks must deal not only with the pregnancy of his daughter, but also with the unexpected pregnancy of his wife.

movies.title: Heat
movies.plot: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

movies.title: Sabrina
movies.plot: A remake of the 1954 classic, where a playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, while his more serious brother becomes involved in their company.

movies.title: Tom and Huck
movies.plot: Two best friends witness a murder and struggle to survive in the dangerous, adventure-filled world of the 19th century Mississippi.

movies.title: Sudden Death
movies.plot: A former fireman must save the U.S. Vice President when terrorists take over a hockey arena during a game.

movies.title: GoldenEye
movies.plot: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop a nuclear warhead from falling into the wrong hands.

movies.title: The American President
movies.plot: A widowed U.S. President running for re-election and an environmental lobbyist fall in love, creating complications for his campaign.

movies.title: Dracula: Dead and Loving It
movies.plot: Mel Brooks's parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film versions.

movies.title: Balto
movies.plot: An outcast half-wolf risks his life to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

movies.title: Nixon
movies.plot: A biographical story of former U.S. President Richard Milhous Nixon, from his days as a young boy to his eventual Presidency, which ended in shame.

movies.title: Cutthroat Island
movies.plot: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

movies.title: Casino
movies.plot: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire and a fast-living, luxury-loving woman.

movies.title: Sense and Sensibility
movies.plot: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.

movies.title: Four Rooms
movies.director: Allison Anders, Alexandre Rockwell, Robert Rodriguez, Quentin Tarantino
movies.plot: Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.

movies.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
movies.plot: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

movies.title: Money Train
movies.plot: A vengeful New York City transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares. His foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

movies.title: Get Shorty
movies.plot: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

movies.title: Copycat
movies.plot: An agoraphobic psychologist and a female detective must work together to take down a serial killer who copies serial killers from the past.

movies.title: Assassins
movies.plot: Professional hit-man Robert Rath wants to fulfill a few more contracts before retiring but finds himself in a fierce competition with rival assassin Miguel Bain.

movies.title: Powder
movies.plot: A young man with superhuman abilities faces the difficulties of integrating into society.

movies.title: Leaving Las Vegas
movies.plot: An alcoholic writer decides to move to Las Vegas and drink himself to death, forming an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with a prostitute.

movies.title: Othello
movies.plot: The Moorish general Othello is manipulated into believing that his new wife has been carrying on an affair with one of his officers.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.plot: A computer programmer discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation created by machines, and joins a rebellion to break free.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

movies.title: The Terminator
movies.plot: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: Inception
movies.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: Memento
movies.plot: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer using notes and tattoos.

movies.title: American Beauty
movies.plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

movies.title: The Sixth Sense
movies.plot: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

movies.title: The Usual Suspects
movies.plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

movies.title: Fargo
movies.plot: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.plot: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.plot: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies.plot: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

movies.title: Good Will Hunting
movies.plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: A Beautiful Mind
movies.plot: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

movies.title: The Big Lebowski
movies.plot: The Dude Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

movies.title: Trainspotting
movies.plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

movies.title: L.A. Confidential
movies.plot: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

movies.title: The Fifth Element
movies.plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

movies.title: Die Hard
movies.plot: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

movies.title: American History X
movies.plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

movies.title: The Truman Show
movies.plot: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

movies.title: Groundhog Day
movies.plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

movies.title: The Princess Bride
movies.plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

movies.title: Blade Runner
movies.plot: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movies.plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

movies.title: The Pianist
movies.plot: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.plot: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

movies.title: Apocalypse Now
movies.plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

movies.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
movies.plot: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

movies.title: Requiem for a Dream
movies.plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.plot: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movies.title: The Godfather: Part II
movies.plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.plot: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

movies.title: The Revenant
movies.plot: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

movies.title: Black Swan
movies.plot: A committed dancer struggles to maintain her sanity after winning the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's Swan Lake.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.plot: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

movies.title: Gone Girl
movies.plot: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

movies.title: The Theory of Everything
movies.plot: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

movies.title: Her
movies.plot: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

movies.title: The Imitation Game
movies.plot: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.

movies.title: Gravity
movies.plot: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

movies.title: Moonlight
movies.plot: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

movies.title: Room
movies.plot: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

movies.title: Arrival
movies.plot: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

movies.title: Ex Machina
movies.plot: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

movies.title: Birdman
movies.plot: A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.

movies.title: 12 Years a Slave
movies.plot: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

movies.title: Dallas Buyers Club
movies.plot: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

movies.title: Spotlight
movies.plot: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese.

movies.title: The Shape of Water
movies.plot: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.
